subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Plenette Pierson scored 20 points to help the visiting Liberty snap a three-game losing streak and hamper the Washington Mystics’ playoff seeding with a 73-61 victory.
snippet: Plenette Pierson scored 20 points to help the visiting Liberty snap a three-game losing streak and hamper the Washington Mystics’ playoff seeding with a 73-61 victory.
